required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Learning Curve of Fiberoptic Intubation Through Supraglottic Airway Device
clinical_study.official_title: Learning Curve of Fiberoptic-guided Tracheal Intubation Through Supraglottic Airway Device for Pediatric Difficult Airway Manikin

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to obtain learning curve data of residents for fiberoptic-guided tracheal intubation through supraglottic airway device for pediatric difficult airway manikin.

detailed_description.textblock: Residents under anesthesiology training will undergo a simulation practice to a pediatric airway manikin, after a single demonstration by an expert for fiberoptic-guided tracheal intubation through supraglottic airway device. The participants will do the same practice 20 times to the same manikin.

primary_outcome.measure: Elapsed time to succeed endotracheal intubation for each training period
primary_outcome.time_frame: From start of each training period to success of endotracheal intubation, not to exceed 10 minutes

secondary_outcome.measure: Elapsed time to successful insertion of supraglottic airway device and ventilation of the manikin for each training period
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of each training period to success of ventilation, not to exceed 10 minutes

secondary_outcome.measure: Elapsed time to identification of vocal cords via fiberoptic bronchoscope for each training period
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of each training period to identification of vocal cords, not to exceed 10 minutes

secondary_outcome.measure: Elapsed time to introduction of fiberoptic bronchoscope into the trachea for each training period
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of each training period to introduction of fiberoptic bronchoscope into the trachea, not to exceed 10 minutes

secondary_outcome.measure: Success rate of endotracheal intubation for each training period
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start of each training period to success of endotracheal intubation, not to exceed 10 minutes
From start of each training period to success of endotracheal intubation, not to exceed 10 minutes
secondary_outcome.description: Number of trials to succeed ventilation, vocal cord identification, fiberoptic bronchoscope introduction, endotracheal intubation for each training period

arm_group.description: Training of fiberoptic-guided tracheal intubation through supraglottic airway device to pediatric airway manikin

intervention.description: 20-times training of fiberoptic-guided tracheal intubation through supraglottic airway device to pediatric airway manikin

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Residents under anesthesiology training with experience of more than 30 times of supraglottic airway device insertion and manipulation of fiberoptic bronchoscope
Exclusion Criteria:
- Prior experience of fiberoptic-guided tracheal intubation through supraglottic airway device
- Prior experience of training for fiberoptic-guided tracheal intubation through supraglottic airway device
